Configuring
Configuring / Configuring media / Defining media objects / Using supplied media objects
Using supplied media objects
RICOH ProcessDirector provides several predefined system media objects. You can modify the properties of the predefined media objects and use
them in your environment.
To modify and use a supplied media object:
1. Click the Administration tab.
2. In the left pane, click Media â‡’ System Media.
3. Right-click the media object that you want to modify and select Properties.
4. Change the required and optional properties that need to be adjusted to match your environment.
5. Click OK.
Parent topic: Defining media objects
1 of 1
